TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Brushes extends System.Object

summary.span: 实现一组预定义的 对象。

span.span: Implements a set of predefined objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Presentation Foundation 中的颜色名称与在.NET Framework 中，Windows 窗体的颜色名称匹配和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)]。Color names in Windows Presentation Foundation match the color names in the .NET Framework, Windows Forms, and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)]. 这些颜色，其名称基于 UNIX X11 颜色值。These colors and their names are based on the UNIX X11 color values. 下图显示的每个预定义的画笔、 其名称和其十六进制值的颜色。The following image shows the color of each predefined brush, its name, and its hexadecimal value. ![预定义颜色](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "预定义颜色")![Predefined colors](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "Predefined colors") 颜色表包括颜色样本、 颜色名称和十六进制值Color table including a color swatch, the color name, and the hexadecimal value 请参阅有许多种其他、 更复杂，您可以绘制区域的类。See the class for a variety of other, more complex, ways that you can paint an area. 例如，尝试使用渐变 (， ) 或图像 ()。For example, try using gradients (, ) or images (). ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 不能声明此托管的类中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但你可以使用其静态属性将中的值分配[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush AliceBlue { get; }
.property class System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush AliceBlue
Public Shared ReadOnly Property AliceBlue As SolidColorBrush
public: static property System::Windows::Media::SolidColorBrush ^ AliceBlue { System::Windows::Media::SolidColorBrush ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取具有十六进制值 #FFF0F8FF 的纯色填充颜色。

span.span: Gets the solid fill color that has a hexadecimal value of #FFF0F8FF.
A frozen with a of #FFF0F8FF.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为此属性返回的画笔被冻结 (其属性是**true**)，它不能进行动画处理。Because the brush returned by this property is frozen (its property is **true**), it can't be animated. 有关如何进行动画处理 SolidColorBrush 的信息，请参阅[如何： 对进行动画处理的颜色或 SolidColorBrush 的不透明度](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-the-color-or-opacity-of-a-solidcolorbrush.md)。For information about how to animate a SolidColorBrush, see [How to: Animate the Color or Opacity of a SolidColorBrush](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-the-color-or-opacity-of-a-solidcolorbrush.md). 请参阅类页的用法信息，包括示例，和有关预定义的系统颜色的列表。See the class page for usage information, including examples, and for a listing of predefined system colors. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
